projects.name: Realtime Volumetric Cloud Shader
projects.description: A procedural shader using ray-marching and FBMs to create volumetric clouds. Based on two Siggraph presentations from Guerrilla Games and DICE.

projects.name: 3D Scene Using WebGL API
projects.description: A 3D scene of a castle using only the standard WebGL API. To make it I implemented a Scene graph structure, phong lighting, and texture mapping.
